Tony,

     I would like to thank you for placing this information on the 
=
web.  You obviously know what you're talking about and have done a 
lot of =
research. 

    You're right.  I did miss the site specifically meant 
for =
"TENTS".  Don't know how that happened, but I'm glad you pointed 
it out to=
 me.  This is exactly what I needed.

    It's been years since I've watche=
d "Shogun".  It's probably time 
I sit through it again.  (As well as make =
the young men in my 
household, who want to do Samurai persona, do the same=
.) 

     One quick question for you...You suggest that, historically, the =

Japanese probably used wooden supports for the awning.  I intend to 
use a=
 garage canopy - as you suggested - due to costs, safety, and 
structural i=
ntegrity.  Do you think that covering the piping with 
bamboo would be "per=
iod".

Michael
